item.title: Woman Of The Hour: How Serial Killer Rodney Alcala Was Caught
item.description: Rodney Alcala was not caught on national television in Woman of The Hour, but by a teenager who narrowly escaped him two years later in the desert.

item.title: Woman Of The Hour Leaves Out A Wild Detail About Rodney Alcala's Time In New York City
item.description: Woman of the Hour portrays many real-life events from Rodney Alcala's life but surprisingly leaves out a wild detail from his time in New York City.

item.title: Sony Asked Netflix To Buy Zachary Levi's Purple Crayon Movie But The Streamer Said No
item.description: Netflix refused to acquire Zachary Leviâ€™s Harold and the Purple Crayon for its platform due to its new strategy to create better films.
